Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
22.07.2014 GB SCR19037 Button Approve manually: added error message: "Finance not allowed"
26.06.2014 GB SCR18991 Added screen with CREM_NOTICE and button Details
16.05.2014 SH SCR18905 Moved virtuals, filled if button Legal credit margin is pressed, from 2. subform (now deleted) to
mainscreen (Performance issue, scrolling in table)
09.05.2014 SH SCR18880 Button Approve: Extended test to ask users to explain the reason ... (if GSBU_YESNO(2096) = Y)
30.04.2014 GB SCR18864 Added button Legal credit margin
25.04.2014 SH SCR18860 Button Approve manually: Added new tests; Added new button Unapprove
18.04.2014 SH SCR18837 Diff. changes (e.g. filter on MQDT_USRID; Contents of v.Status)
15.04.2014 SH SCR18831 Button Delete Advance: Added deletion of CLNA, CLAB, CLAD rows
08.04.2014 SH SCR18811 Changed row color from red to grey if CLNT404_WWWAUTOMATIC = Y and ...
08.04.2014 JH SCR18811 Remove subtask CheckApproval(Obtain CLAB)
04.04.2014 JH SCR18811 Different changes
-- Used to lock MQ and CLNA, see R.S.
-- Shortcut labels
-- OMQ300 is called for MQ = 300, 301 and 302
... set initial vaule for filter
-- Define where clause to select MQDT (used in task to set combobox
contents for user filter)
-- Shortcut handling
... lock advance/message (active user)
... unlock advance/message (active user)
... lock only message (active user), only MQ will be deleted
... no need to unlock message, already deleted
... lock only message (active user), only MQ will be deleted
... no need to unlock message, already deleted
... lock advance/message (active user)
... unlock advance/message (active user)
... lock advance/message (active user)
... unlock advance/message (active user)
-- Fetch tasktitle according to PI.MQDT_ID
... set/reset
... lock not possible because CLNA row is locked by an other user
... lock
... unlock
... lock not possible because locked by another user

SQL_STMT_U.val: select distinct MQDT_USRID from :1/MQDT where :2 for fetch only

Text.val: -- For display when the button Legal credit margin is clicked
...reset virtuals, displayed on screen when button Legal credit margin is pressed
... set cursor always on first parkable field on screen, speeds up scrolling if e.g. a button was pressed
-- Additional checks if MQ's for teh curent advance can be deleted
-- Check if securities have been released by the security department
... error: "Securities have not yet been released by the security department"
-- Finance not allowed
... error: "Finance not allowed"
-- Check client/advance currency
... error: "Approval not possible. Advance in foreign currency"
-- Check if advance exceeds maximal investment
... error: "Advance exceeds maximal investment"
-- Check user permission for this client approval (client data access)
... error: "No modify permission for this program or client"
-- Check user permission for approvals
... error: "Insufficient permission for approval"
-- Approval is allowed continue within separate task (transaction lvel)
-- Check user permission for this client approval (client data access)
... error: "No modify permission for this program or client"
-- Check user permission for approvals
... error: "Insufficient permission for approval"
-- Unapproval is allowed continue within separate task (transaction lvel)
-- Set virtuals, used to display on screen

ExpSyntax.val: IF(NOT(ISNULL({0,31})) AND {0,31}>Date(),MlsTrans('Future'),IF({0,26}<>'',MlsTrans('Manual 3'),IF({0,25}<>'',MlsTrans('Manual 2'),IF ({0,15}='N',MlsTrans('Manual 1'),IF ({0,15}='Y' AND {0,36} ,MlsTrans('Auto block approval'),IF({0,15}='Y' AND NOT({0,42}),MlsTrans('Auto'),MlsTrans('Manual 1')))))))

Text.val: -- CREM_NOTICE used only for tooltip on column "Reason"
-- Obtain CLNA again, to avoid that CLNA_CLIENTCHARGED is changed in the meanwhile
-- Error: "Advance is already charged to client, deletion is not allowed"
-- Error: "MQ xxx is locked by user xxx"
-- Delete MQ302
-- Call BMQ010 at G.S. level MQDT_LINENO to avoid messages like
'Record has beeen lost'
-- Check for exceeded internal limit (block reason = 90)
... Ask users to enter text to explain the reason for exceeded internal limit
-- Final approval updates
... first clean up memeory table where users can add text
-- fetch max. line number, used only in create mode
-- If user changed something on screen, ask to skip storing changes

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Reason for the exceeded internal limit')

Text.val: -- Success indication to rct.CREM
Disable buttons in toolbar
